description.value:
Covers 2 square meres of space. Anyone walking on them without at least 1 AP on their feet counts as being hit by a weapon with the Toxic Quality and must make a -10 Agility Test. If passed their movement is halved, if failed their movement is quartered. This speed reduction lasts until the victim receives medical treatment.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 6 T
